page.title: 08SHOPPING
page.content: As there are no shops in Greenloaning everyone has to travel to shop.Most people travel to Stirling to do their main shopping at Tesco or Fine Fare for groceries. The Thistle Centre has lots of shops in it where you can buy clothes, shoes, furniture, electrical goods,books,meat,bread,cakes,medicines and almost anything you can think of. The bus service is poor,one every two hours, so most people drive there. The distance is about 20km. The nearest shops are in Braco where there is the Post Office,newsagents& general store, and the V.G store. A butcher's van comes on Tuesday and Friday each week from the Butcher's shop in Dunblane, and Sandy,the butcher, is always cheery. The fishmonger comes early on Wednesday morning with nice fresh fish from Arbroath.These are the only vans that come to Greenloaning.
